description: We are looking for a talented video creator who enjoys making software tutorials. We are looking for an end to end solution where you script, capture and edit the videos, delivering a complete video along with the description, title, tags that is ready for publishing. After educating you on our software and how it integrates with other software you would be tasked to creating videos that show how to use the software and how it integrates with other popular software to deliver massive value to the user. The videos will include segments of you in front of the camera and screen captures of what you are doing. The videos will vary in length anywhere from shorts to full length (8-10 minute). Our ideal candidate is funny, witty and can carry a story all while educating the audience in a memorable way. If this sounds like you please apply. Be sure to include examples of relevant work you have done.
title: Video Creator for Software How To's & Tutorials

description: Seeking Experienced Real Estate Accountant for Part-Time Role ## Job Overview We are seeking a seasoned accountant with expertise in real estate partnership accounting to join our team on a part-time basis. This role offers an excellent opportunity for a retired real estate professional looking to stay engaged in the industry while earning extra income. ## Key Responsibilities - Handle financial reporting for a self-storage development real estate partnership - Interface with our annual tax reporting professional - Manage bookkeeping tasks - Prepare and review financial statements - Ensure compliance with accounting standards and tax regulations ## Qualifications - Extensive experience in real estate partnership accounting - Strong knowledge of institutional partner reporting requirements - Familiarity with self-storage industry accounting practices (preferred) - Excellent attention to detail and ability to work independently - Proficiency in accounting software and Microsoft Excel ## Job Details - **Time Commitment**: Approximately 2-3 hours per month - **Duration**: 5-year project - **Compensation**: Monthly or quarterly payment (negotiable) ## Ideal Candidate We are looking for a reliable professional who can work autonomously with minimal supervision. The ideal candidate will have a proven track record in handling similar responsibilities and can efficiently manage the financial aspects of our real estate partnership. ## How to Apply Qualified candidates should submit their resume, along with a brief cover letter explaining their relevant experience and interest in this part-time role. Please include any experience with self-storage developments and institutional partner reporting in your application. This position offers flexibility and is perfect for a retired real estate accounting professional seeking a rewarding part-time engagement. Join our team and contribute your expertise to our growing self-storage development project.
title: Real Estate Reporting and Accounting for Real Estate Partnership (US Based Only)

description: We are seeking a skilled Demand Generation Specialist, with LinkedIn and Google Ads expertise, to drive our paid advertising campaigns. This two-week starter project offers $3,000, with the potential for ongoing work at $10,000 per month if successful. We measure success based on the number of meetings booked. The ideal candidate will have a proven track record in driving quality leads and conversions through targeted ads. If you are passionate about optimizing campaigns and increasing ROI, we want to hear from you! About Us Klarity (YCombinator S18) uses Natural Language Processing to automate document review for Finance and Accounting teams. We solve the problem of messy and incomplete data in systems like Salesforce and Netsuite. Our customers include companies like Okta, Cloudflare, OpenAI, and Coupa. They use Klarity to: - Save time - Increase compliance - Ease the pain of contract review We found strong Product Market Fit a couple years ago and just raised a $70m Series B in June 2024 to help us capitalize on the hyper-growth we are currently experiencing. We have spent years working on our core NLP platform and found a product market fit by focusing on the Revenue Recognition use case. Our product straddles multiple domains - Enterprise software systems (CRM, ERP, etc.), advanced ML/NLP, Finance/Accounting compliance - making for a complex, multi-stakeholder lifecycle. If you’re someone who thrives in this kind of complexity and excels at distilling multifaceted problems into solutions for customers, then come see if you'd like to work with us!
title: LinkedIn and Google Ad specialist

description: Join an excellent, educated team working on sophisticated Real Estate Transactions. Be part of a dynamic environment where your skills will be recognized and appreciated! Paid Training, Work from Home, and an Opportunity to Be Appreciated! ALL CANDIDATES TAKE TWO ASSESSMENT TESTS. NO CANDIDATES WILL BE CONSIDERED WITHOUT TAKING THE TESTS. ONCE YOU COMPLETE THE FIRST TEST, THE SECOND TEST WILL BE EMAILED TO YOU IMMEDIATELY AFTER. LINK TO FIRST ASSESSMENT: (link removed) About Us: Arbie Real Estate Solutions is an investment firm focused on acquiring 1-4 family properties in Brooklyn, Bronx, Queens, Manhattan, and Nassau County. We utilize multiple exit strategies, including fix-and-flip, wholesaling, and ground-up development. Arbie embraces an entrepreneurial spirit with a straightforward approach to the real estate industry. Our team is innovative, dedicated, and always pushing boundaries. If you thrive in a non-corporate, creative environment and are eager to elevate your career, we want you on our team! Compensation: Weekly base salary plus bonuses. Key Responsibilities for the Bookkeeper Role: Financial Record Management: Maintain accurate financial records, including accounts payable, accounts receivable, and general ledger entries. Expense Tracking and Reporting: Record and categorize financial transactions in accounting software and ensure all expenses are documented properly. Invoice Management: Prepare and issue invoices to clients and vendors, and follow up on outstanding payments. Bank Reconciliation: Regularly reconcile bank statements, credit card statements, and other financial accounts. Payroll Processing: Assist in processing payroll, ensuring accuracy and compliance with relevant regulations. Financial Analysis: Prepare regular financial reports and assist with budget planning and analysis to support decision-making. Communication: Liaise with other departments, such as property management and legal, to ensure proper financial documentation and records are maintained. Compliance: Ensure financial practices are compliant with company policies and regulatory requirements. What We’re Looking For: Strong attention to detail and organizational skills. Excellent written and verbal communication skills. Proficiency in accounting software (e.g., QuickBooks, Xero) and Microsoft Office Suite. Ability to manage multiple tasks and prioritize effectively. Strong analytical skills and the ability to provide insightful financial analysis. Receptive to learning and not afraid to ask questions. Prior experience in bookkeeping or a related role is preferred. Comfortable working in a dynamic, fast-paced environment. Job Type: Full-time Softwares Used: Buildium (General Ledger and Property Management Software) Microsoft Excel Asana (Project Management) Thank you for your consideration. Job Type: Full-time - Part-time Roughly 30 hours a month Benefits: Paid sick time Paid time off Work from home Schedule: Monday to Friday US shift Supplemental Pay: Performance bonus Work Location: Remote
title: Seeking Accounting / CFO / Reporting expert

description: I am a General Contractor in Northern Virginia. A client had their front door kicked in and will be going through insurance for the repair. I do not usually do insurance work and do not have the Xactimate software but would like to provide them a quote using it. I need someone familiar with the software to do a detailed estimate and align it with my own idea of what I would charge for the job. I would prefer a fixed price for generating the estimate since it should be fairly straightforward but will entertain hourly. The door and jamb need to be replaced. The main slab is delaminated, and the hinges/ hinge jamb are broken into pieces. The attached pictures are after I repaired what I could. The door is a 3068 RH Fiberglass 6 panel entry door. It has an integrated 12" sidelight on the left. The total width is 50 3/4". Above the door is a 12" tall transom window added to the door in the field and installed as one unit. PVC brick molding on the exterior. 3.5" casing interior. The house has a brick facade, so it needs extension jambs. Will need paint and calk inside and out. New handle hardware, and electronic deadbolt. I also did an emergency repair Thanksgiving morning to secure the property that I would like to include. Please let me know if this is something you can provide me with and what the cost would be. Thank you John
title: Xactimate construction estimate for insurance repair of front door

description: We are looking for a skilled software developer to create a custom photo comparison software for a very specific purpose (not facial comparison, static objects). The software should be able to compare images based on specific criteria and provide accurate results. The developer should have experience in developing image processing algorithms and be proficient in programming languages such as Python or C++. The successful candidate will work closely with our team to understand the requirements and develop a tailored solution. The project duration is expected to be 1 to 3 months, with a possibility of extension. This is a medium-sized project that requires an intermediate level of expertise. Will need to sign a NDA.
title: Photo Comparison Software Developer

description: Nuanced Media is looking for a virtual assistant to help us implement and update documentation into an already established platform upholding best practices previously established for a knowledge management system. In addition, we are looking for a virtual assistant to help us manage project planning according to company policy and procedure. Sound like you? Keep reading! We are looking for a long-term partnership that will provide consistent ongoing work. The work will include the following tasks: - Update and maintain standard operating procedure documentation - Update and maintain automation with our knowledge management systems - Assist with implementation of automation and processes with the team - Assist with project planning - Assist with process and documentation improvements The following skills are a must: - Strong typing and writing skills - Strong ability to follow and create a process and provide feedback, if necessary - Working knowledge of the Agile methodology - Strong software adaptation skills - Great communication skills via phone, email, and chat Additionally, please give a brief 1-2 paragraph summary of your experience in maintaining standard operating procedures, updating documentation, and/or knowledge management platforms and why you feel like you’d be a great fit for this work. Also, please include any experience you have in project planning, management, or any other related experience you feel would apply to these areas. About Nuanced Media: Nuanced Media is a full-service e-commerce marketing agency specializing in Amazon, multi-channel e-commerce marketing, website design and development, and company branding. Our experienced staff focuses on creating continued business growth for our clients. Our research team determines which market segments are most likely to seek our clients’ products. Our design and development teams craft sleek, purpose-built Shopify websites and brands. Our marketing team blends its extensive knowledge of Internet resources with innovative marketing methods to build effective campaigns increasing sales and awareness. All of our teams work together to produce the best possible results for our clients. We seek to build long-term fruitful relationships, continuing to help our clients long after their website or marketing campaign has launched. Nuanced Media believes this collaborative and committed effort produces the best results. Our values: - Inspiration: We’re fascinated by the industry and what we can do with it. - Teamwork: The best results come from collaboration, candor, and research. - Relationships: We care a lot about our teammates and our clients. - Smart Solutions: We do things the right way, not necessarily the easy way. - Recognition: We celebrate your wins. You can visit Nuancedmedia.com for any extra information
title: Documentation and Knowledge Management Virtual Assistant

description: Greetings to those who are reading this. I have taken a liking to learn bookkeeping since I am majoring in Finance and have recently complete the certificates within QuickBooks to become a pro advisor. I am planning on launching my bookkeeping business within the next month, but would love someone to help me along side as I take on clients for the business. I have a strong foundation of general accounting practices and methods as well as a solid level of using Quickbooks, but still feel a bit nervous starting out and don't want to make mistakes as I have only done bookkeeping for one client so far. So I am looking to bring someone in to help with what the client needs whether it be bank reconciliation, matching transactions, preparing financial statements, categorizing expenses, fixing errors, etc.. I am willing to pay the rate of which you charge and if everything works out would love to have you around and help me manage other clients books to as well.
title: Quickbooks Bookkeeping Assistant

description: About Us: Serial Progress Seeker is looking for a skilled and ambitious .NET Developer to join our team on a contract basis. This role involves working on both existing enterprise software and new application development projects. You'll collaborate with us to design, develop, customize, test, and deploy robust software solutions. Key Responsibilities: Develop and maintain applications using the .NET framework and related technologies. Build applications from scratch, improve existing systems, and provide user technical support. Write well-designed, testable, and efficient code using .NET programming. Integrate data from various back-end services and databases. Create and maintain programming applications with user-friendly functionality. Revise, debug, and refactor existing code to enhance performance and maintainability. Author unit tests with acceptable code coverage. Create and maintain comprehensive documentation for source code. Assist in the technical support of production systems and train end-users on the final product. Stay updated on the latest tools and technologies to enhance application features and performance. Ensure compatibility of applications with newer software and operating system versions. Understand the software lifecycle and implement changes based on testing feedback. Additional Expectations: Participate in requirement analysis and contribute to feature specifications and technical design blueprints. Collaborate effectively within a team environment and adhere to Agile methodologies. Diagnose errors aggressively and implement creative resolutions. Required Skills and Experience: Proficiency with the .NET framework, SQL, REST, RPC APIs, and software design patterns. Strong organizational skills to juggle multiple tasks within timelines and budgets. At least 3 years of experience in .NET development. Familiarity with GitHub, DigitalOcean, GoDaddy, and API integrations (Google API, Facebook API, etc) Solid understanding of Agile methodologies and best practices in software development. Exceptional communication skills and the ability to collaborate with cross-functional teams. Test Project (Required for Consideration): To ensure candidates meet the necessary qualifications and attention to detail, we require a small demonstration project: Build a mini .NET application that displays "Hello, [Your Name]!" when accessed. Push the code to a GitHub repository and share the repository link with us. Why Work With Us? Opportunities to work on challenging and exciting projects. Flexible work arrangements. A collaborative and supportive team environment. How to Apply: Introduce yourself and highlight your relevant experience. Provide links to your portfolio or previous projects. Share the GitHub repository link for the test project. We’re excited to collaborate with a driven and talented developer to bring our ideas to life. Apply today and show us what you can do!
title: Experienced .NET Developer for Mini-App Development

description: About Us Sonatafy Technology is a leading nearshore software development company specializing in building dedicated teams of software engineers across Latin America. We empower businesses by providing top-tier software development services, helping them accelerate innovation and achieve their strategic goals. Job Description We are seeking a highly motivated Lead Sales Development Representative (SDR) with a strong understanding of technical decision-making markets and software development. The ideal candidate is a proactive self-starter skilled in lead generation and appointment setting and has a proven track record of engaging with key decision-makers in the tech industry. Key Responsibilities B2B Lead Generation: Identify and qualify potential services clients through research, networking, and targeted outreach strategies. Typical targets are CTOs, CIOs, and VP/Director of Software Engineering across multiple industries. B2B Appointment Setting: Successfully schedule meetings and demos with qualified leads for the sales team. Strategic Outreach: Craft compelling and personalized emails and LinkedIn messages to engage prospects effectively. Cold Calling: Confidently conduct cold calls to prospective clients, introducing Sonatafy's services and value propositions. Market Insight: Leverage your knowledge of software development and technical markets to tailor outreach and engagement strategies. Pipeline Management: Maintain accurate and up-to-date information in the CRM system regarding lead and prospect interactions. Collaboration: Work closely with the sales and marketing teams to develop strategies that drive revenue growth. Reporting: Provide regular reports on outreach activities, lead generation metrics, and pipeline status. Manage a team of assistants to reduce manual tasks so that you can focus on customized outreach. Collaborate with CEO and VP of Marketing to develop prospecting strategies. Qualifications Experience: Minimum of 8 years in a B2B Sales Development Representative or similar role, preferably within the tech industry. Technical Understanding: Strong knowledge of software development processes and the ability to understand technical decision-making. Communication Skills: Exceptional written and verbal communication skills with the ability to craft persuasive messaging. Lead Generation Expertise: Proven success in generating leads and setting appointments through various channels. Cold Calling Proficiency: Demonstrated ability to effectively conduct cold calls and navigate gatekeepers. LinkedIn Savvy: Proficient in using LinkedIn for networking, outreach, and lead generation. Email Marketing Skills: Ability to write strong, personalized emails that resonate with technical audiences. CRM Familiarity: Experience with HubSpot CRM for tracking and managing leads. Results-Driven: A track record of meeting or exceeding sales targets and KPIs. Education: Bachelor's degree in Business, Marketing, Computer Science, or a related field is preferred. What we Offer Competitive Salary and Commission Structure Remote Work Opportunity Professional Growth: Opportunities for advancement within a growing company. Collaborative Environment: Work with a dynamic team passionate about technology and innovation. Training and Development: Access to resources that will help you hone your skills and advance your career. How to Apply If you are a driven sales professional with a knack for connecting with technical decision-makers and are eager to contribute to a growing company, we'd love to hear from you! Join Sonatafy Technology and be a part of a team that's shaping the future of software development!
title: Lead B2B SDR

description: We're looking for someone to take on cold calling for our onboarding and training agency You will be responsible for cold calling a list of businesses that is provided to you with the goal of getting them to commit to a meeting to speak to our CEO. We'd like to start with a 2 week trial and then from there it will be a month to month contract. I'm looking for the person(s) who takes on this role to outline what they would need to be successful. We'll be interviewing each person via zoom to get an idea for their cold calling strategy. Relevant experience selling software or selling to agencies is a plus. We will be pursuing 1 of the following ICPs: Real Estate Agents Software Development companies Software Service Provider Companies (IT/Consulting) E-learning companies Please indicate as part of your application which ICP would be ideal for you.
title: Cold Calling & Appointment Setter SDR

description: Full Stack Developer for Real Estate Startup 🚀 NO AGENCIES WE WILL NOT REPLY TO YOU, THANK YOU!!😊 About Us: We are an early-stage startup building the Redfin of Japan, focused on revolutionizing the way people discover and purchase real estate. Our platform will offer a seamless, user-centric experience tailored to English Listing for the Japanese market, providing buyers and sellers with advanced tools and insights. This is a rare opportunity to join a growing company in its early days and have a direct impact on shaping its future. What We’re Looking For: An experienced Full Stack Developer who can take our existing codebase and UX/UI designs and integrate them into a cohesive, high-performing product. You will collaborate closely with the founder and design team to implement features and create a responsive and intuitive platform. Key Responsibilities: • Develop and maintain both front-end and back-end components of the website. • Seamlessly integrate existing code and UX/UI designs. • Design and implement scalable, secure backend systems to manage real estate listings, user accounts, and analytics. • Optimize the website for performance, scalability, and responsiveness. • Collaborate with the design team to ensure a user-friendly and aesthetically pleasing interface. • Implement robust APIs for third-party integrations (e.g., payment systems, mapping services). • Troubleshoot, debug, and upgrade software. Qualifications: • Proven experience as a Full Stack Developer (preferably in real estate, e-commerce, or a similar industry). • Front-end expertise: HTML, CSS, JavaScript (React, Angular, or Vue.js). • Back-end expertise: Node.js, Python (Django or Flask), Ruby on Rails, or equivalent frameworks. • Database management: MySQL, PostgreSQL, or MongoDB. • Familiarity with cloud platforms like AWS, GCP, or Azure. • Strong understanding of RESTful API design and microservices architecture. • Ability to write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code. • Experience with version control (e.g., Git) and CI/CD pipelines. • Knowledge of Japanese real estate systems or a willingness to learn is a huge plus! Nice to Have: • Experience with mapping tools like Google Maps API or similar. • Familiarity with SEO best practices for real estate platforms. • Prior startup experience or ability to thrive in a fast-paced environment. Why Join Us? • Be part of an innovative startup that’s redefining real estate in Japan. • Work with a passionate and talented team. • Opportunity for significant career growth and equity in the company. • Influence the development of a product that impacts thousands (and eventually millions) of users.
title: Full Stack Engineer Needed for Real Estate Website Development

description: Expert Bookkeeper & Tax Specialist for S-Corp LLC Using Zoho Books Job Description: I run a small business providing services to international clients who operate through LLCs. My business is structured as an S-Corp LLC, and I use Zoho CRM and Zoho Books to manage customer relationships and financial records. Key Responsibilities: Update and maintain 2024 accounting records for my S-Corp LLC, ensuring accuracy and timeliness. Set up and manage payroll using Zoho Books, including processing payroll taxes and deductions. Prepare records for the 2024 tax return, ensuring compliance with IRS guidelines and S-Corp tax laws. Provide training on Zoho Books to help me manage day-to-day bookkeeping and finances effectively. Advise on best practices for managing financials, including tax planning and compliance for S-Corp LLCs. Assist with reconciliation, financial reporting, and preparing year-end documents for tax purposes. Ideal Candidate: Extensive experience with Zoho Books and Zoho CRM, particularly for small businesses. Deep understanding of S-Corp LLC tax structures and relevant tax laws. Proven experience in payroll setup and management (preferably with Zoho Books). Strong background in tax preparation and filing for small businesses and S-Corps. Ability to train business owners on Zoho Books to help them manage financials effectively on a day-to-day basis. Strong attention to detail and organizational skills. Experience with international clients or businesses that deal with foreign transactions is a plus. Excellent communication skills and willingness to provide ongoing support and consultations. Qualifications: Proven experience working with Zoho Books and Zoho CRM. Expertise in managing finances for S-Corp LLCs. Background in tax preparation for small businesses. Ability to provide clear, actionable training to enable business owners to handle their own books. Experience in setting up and managing payroll within accounting software. About Me: I am a small business owner seeking to streamline and optimize my financial processes. I need someone who can not only handle the immediate bookkeeping, payroll, and tax preparation tasks but also help me build the knowledge and confidence to manage my own books in the future. Location: While I am based in Seminole, FL, I am open to remote work with professionals who can offer virtual consultations and assistance. Compensation: Competitive hourly rate or project-based pricing. Please provide your rates and availability when applying. If you have the experience and expertise to help me manage my finances smoothly and provide training for long-term success, please reach out to discuss how we can work together.
title: Bookkeeping - ZOHO Books

title: Account Management Transition for Veterinary Services

description: Backstory I have no prior experience in coding or software development. However, I have a strong understanding of software, AI, and their applications. I excel at grasping how to use and apply software in practical, contextual ways. Long story short, I know how to use and manipulate these areas, I don't know how to build them. By leveraging AI tools and self-teaching, I’ve been able to: Create a Full Codebase: I’ve developed and structured the foundational code for my platform entirely on my own. Build a Local Development Environment: I’ve set up a functional Windows environment to test and validate my code using synthetic data generated by a custom-built synthetic data generator. Run and Test Code: I’ve written and executed Python scripts to generate logs, validate outputs, and ensure functionality. Manage Data Locally: All development work has been done in Notepad++, with files stored locally on my computer. I’ve made significant progress, but I’ve reached a point where I need expert guidance to ensure the project is scalable, efficient, and prepared for transition into a fully functioning product. What I’m Looking For I need a skilled developer, engineer, or technical consultant to help me transition from a self-guided project into a robust, scalable system. Specifically, I need assistance with: 1. Optimizing My Development Workflow Guidance on efficiently using tools I’ve already acquired, such as Docker, Google Cloud Storage (GCS), Visual Studio, and GitHub. Suggestions for additional tools or processes that would streamline my development pipeline. 2. Establishing a Scalable Backend Foundation Reviewing and optimizing my current codebase and internal development processes. Setting up a scalable backend infrastructure that can handle real-world data, users, and operations. Implementing best practices for version control, testing, and deployment pipelines. 3. Preparing for Frontend Development Advising on how to structure the backend to ensure a smooth transition to the frontend UI. Helping me prepare for integration with a React-based UI that includes features like document uploads, conversational AI, and custom widgets for data insights. Ensuring the backend design supports multi-user login and secure data handling for customers. 4. Identifying the Best Path Forward Collaborating on a roadmap to get this project from its current state to an MVP (Minimum Viable Product). Recommending the most efficient and scalable architecture for long-term growth. What I’ve Accomplished So Far: Built and tested a synthetic data generator to simulate and validate the platform’s functionality. Created Python scripts to run synthetic data tests and validate outputs. Set up and tested a basic local development environment to verify initial code functionality. Acquired foundational tools like Docker, GCS, and GitHub, though I need help utilizing them effectively. What I Need From You: I’m looking for someone who can: Help me understand and efficiently utilize development tools and workflows. Review, optimize, and build upon the codebase I’ve created. Guide the development of a scalable backend while preparing for the frontend UI. Provide actionable advice to implement a clean, scalable architecture for my platform. Collaborate with me in a way that fosters learning—I want to deeply understand the tools, processes, and decisions behind this project. This is an opportunity to work on a unique project where innovation and foundational thinking are core. If you’re experienced in backend architecture, full-stack development, or scaling software projects, I’d love to collaborate with you to bring this vision to life.
title: Developing new AI software. I need help.

description: I am seeking a skilled QuickBooks expert to help organize my financial records and bring my account up to date. The ideal candidate will have experience with QuickBooks and a strong understanding of accounting principles. Your task will include reviewing existing entries, correcting any discrepancies, and ensuring that all financial data is accurately recorded. Attention to detail and the ability to work independently are crucial for this role. If you have a passion for organization and accounting, I would love to hear from you!

description: This project is for a new candidate who will take over were our previous candidate left off. For the first few months we would need 8 hours a week and depending on how the relationship evolves we can adjust. Please do not post generic replies or reply with the same information in this Ad, those who do will not be considered, we are also not interested in working with Agencies. With that being said, here is what we are looking for: We’re seeking a highly skilled freelance C# developer to support our projects involving API development, OCR/AI technologies, and integration with platforms like PSPDFKit. Google email and calendar, Twilio, Office 365 email and calendar, Stripe, external APIs. This role requires proven expertise in Microsoft Azure, MS SQL, and .NET Core. The ideal candidate is meticulous, has a track record of delivering quality results, and is available for at least 2 hours daily to collaborate with our team. We require a good history from UpWork, anyone with less than 200 hrs and great feedback may not be considered. We are looking for top talent only. Key Responsibilities Maintain and develop APIs for our applications. Work on OCR and AI-related projects, including PSPDFKit integration. and integrations with third party software. Qualifications Location: United States (only freelancers, no agencies). Experience: Minimum 5 years of professional development experience with a strong portfolio showcasing relevant projects. Only top talent will be considered. Skills: Mastery of C# and .NET Core. Deep knowledge of Microsoft Azure and MS SQL. Experience with integrating with Office 365, Google, Stripe, Twilio Expertise with OCR/AI technologies Experience with PSPDFKit (e-signature will be added soon) Proven problem-solving abilities with a focus on quality and attention to detail. What We Offer Flexible working hours. (8 hrs a week during mornings EST) Opportunity to work on cutting-edge projects and work long term with us. Collaborative and respectful team environment. Upwork Experience: Only freelancers Top rated or Top rated PLUS only (PLUS will have an edge) Over 250 hours working with Upwork If you meet the above criteria and are excited about contributing to meaningful projects, we’d love to hear from you! Please include examples of your past work and a brief note about why you’re a great fit for this role. Please note that I will take my time hiring, if you want to find immediate job this is not for you, I plan on hiring someone to give them a small project as a test on December and then full access to the code and work on our APIs starting Jan 2025, with the right candidate we will work on a daily basis hopefully for years to come. If you have any questions please feel free to drop a line. If you don't have proven experience with the above requirements please do not apply, our first question will be to ask you to provide us with details on those qualifications.
title: Expert C# Net Core and API Developer with OCR/AI Experience & Microsoft Azure Proficiency

description: The description of the work is better viewed in more detail in the attached pdf file. This project is to develop a software tool, henceforth referred to as “the System” for the client of this specification that works in or with NinjaTrader (NT) and is capable of receiving orders from a message publisher and then placing and managing orders in NT. NT shall be connected to a futures broker that supports futures trading such as Tradovate. • The tool shall work with Ninja Trader and either written: • entirely directly in NinjaTrader as an add-on or • in a combination of NinjaTrader and a custom developed software component running on the same machine as NinjaTrader • The architecture diagrams in this specification artifact describes what is meant by the two bullets above (see attached) Additional details will follow for qualified proposals. The work will completed in 3 phases or iterations. The $2000 budget was put out an estimate for the first phase. It is a very negotiable budget.
title: Ninja Trader Add-on Developer for Futures Orders

description: Senior Network Security Engineer Responsibilities: Network Security Design and Implementation: Configure and maintain Palo Alto and Cisco platforms, including firewall setups. Develop and deploy unified security policies across physical and virtual environments. Configure and manage VPNs (B2B and C2B) and geo-blocking measures. Conduct threat inspections for inbound and outbound data flows. Threat Prevention and Analysis: Monitor and mitigate known and unknown threats, including malware, spyware, and exploits. Perform intrusion prevention and detection. Automate threat prevention operations and ensure system compliance with industry best practices. Technical Consulting: Conduct architecture reviews, health checks, and configuration audits. Provide expertise on security design and ensure alignment with Harris County Universal Services Reference Architecture (USRA). Guide system migration and installations with a focus on minimal downtime. Support and Maintenance: Provide ongoing troubleshooting and diagnostics for network systems. Ensure system availability and reliability for data center-level bandwidth (1-100 GB). Maintain centralized logging and reporting for cohesive policy management. Hardware and Software Management: Install and maintain rack-mounted hardware with dual power supplies and redundant capabilities. Ensure integration of new hardware or software with existing systems. Manage updates, patches, and security upgrades.
title: Senior Network Security Engineer

description: Job Overview: We are seeking an experienced and professional Technical Support Specialist to support our students and staff in a technology-driven learning environment. In this role, you will troubleshoot hardware, software, and network-related issues, assist with maintaining and deploying technology resources, and ensure a smooth and efficient digital experience for our school community. This is a great opportunity for an IT professional looking for a flexible part-time role where their expertise will make a direct impact. Key Responsibilities: Provide technical support to students and staff, troubleshooting intermediate-level hardware, software, and network issues. Diagnose and resolve problems with computers, printers, Wi-Fi, and other technology equipment. Configure, deploy, and maintain devices, including laptops, tablets, and other classroom technology. Assist with software installations, updates, and management for school systems. Support virtual learning platforms and resolve access or technical issues during online sessions. Maintain accurate documentation of issues, solutions, and resources for future reference. Qualifications: Intermediate understanding of computer hardware, software, and networking. Proficiency with operating systems such as Windows and macOS. Familiarity with educational software, virtual learning platforms, and troubleshooting processes. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to work collaboratively in a school setting. Strong organizational skills and the ability to manage multiple tasks effectively. A proven track record of reliability, responsibility, and professionalism. Preferred Skills (Highly Desired): Hands-on experience with device troubleshooting (e.g., laptops, tablets, printers). Familiarity with Google Workspace (formerly G Suite) and Microsoft Office tools. Experience with basic networking concepts, including configuring routers and diagnosing internet connectivity issues. Knowledge of educational technology tools and platforms used in K-12 or higher education settings. RESPONSIBILITIES SUBJECT TO CHANGE ON AN AS NEEDED BASIS Why Join Us? Work in a collaborative, technology-focused environment. Make a meaningful contribution to students’ educational experiences. Gain valuable experience while enjoying a flexible part-time schedule.
title: Technical Support Specialist

description: We are seeking a skilled developer to create a comprehensive POS system tailored for our liquor store. The system should support transactions via cash and card, manage inventory, and generate detailed sales reports. Additionally, it should seamlessly sync with our existing website for real-time updates. If you have experience with retail POS solutions and a strong understanding of inventory management, we would love to hear from you! I need a POS system for a liquor store. I have 2 registers, and I need to be able to sell items in cash and by card. I need to be able to access the report from anywhere to check inventory and generate a report. also, I need to be able to generate a report for any period of time. POS needs to track inventory and sync with the store website. I don't have website right now, but I have the website domain. currently, I have a Clover system. Also, I need to be able to enter custom items and prices. also have buttons for discount. I'm thinking of adding customer phone numbers to collect points for members' discounts.
title: POS System Development for Liquor Store

description: Updated Project Brief: Dante Video AV-H Encoder and Decoder Project Objective: To design, develop, and manufacture a new line of Dante AV-H encoders and decoders that are PoE powered and compatible with Dante AV networking. These devices will be available in various form factors, including chassis-based cards, standalone surface-mount units, and standalone wall-plate units. Key Features: PoE Powering: All devices will be powered over Ethernet (PoE) for simplified installation. Dante AV Compatibility: Devices will seamlessly integrate with Dante AV networks, enabling flexible audio-visual distribution and routing. Multiple Form Factors: Chassis-Based Cards: Hot-swappable cards for flexible configuration in Dante AV systems. Standalone Surface-Mount Units: Compact, self-contained units for desktop or rack-mount applications. Standalone Wall-Plate Units: Discreet, wall-mountable units for AV distribution in conference rooms and other spaces. Robust AV Connectivity: HDMI: High-bandwidth digital video and audio connectivity. Analog Balanced Audio: Professional-grade audio input and output. User-Friendly Indicators: Power Lights: Visual confirmation of power status. Streaming Lights: Indication of Dante AV network connectivity and streaming status. Hardware Specifications: CPU/SoC: 32-bit/64-bit ARM or x86 SoC Software: Linux v.4.19 or later with support for running containers Flash Storage Space: 64 MB Video Codec: H.264/AVC and H.265/HEVC Resolution Support: 1920x1080 2560x1440 3840x2160 (4K) Frame Rate Support: 29.97, 30, 59.97, 60 fps Video Latency: A few frames Audio: 2x2 Dante audio channels Network: Standard 1 GbE Dante AV-H Benefits: Interoperability: Seamless integration with the extensive Dante AV ecosystem. Flexibility: Independent routing of video and audio streams. Scalability: Easily expand systems as needed. Reliability: Robust and reliable performance. Security: Enhanced security features with Dante Domain Manager or Dante Director. Target Market: Professional AV integrators Corporate AV departments Education institutions Houses of worship Broadcast facilities Project Scope Document: Dante Video AV-H Encoder and Decoder 1. Product Development: Hardware Design: Design and develop hardware for all form factors (chassis cards, standalone units, wall-plate units). Ensure compliance with PoE standards and Dante AV protocols. Design and integrate HDMI, analog audio, and Ethernet interfaces. Design and implement power supply circuitry for PoE operation. Develop PCB layouts and schematics. Select and integrate appropriate CPU/SoC, flash storage, and video codec components. Design the hardware to support user-selectable resolutions and frame rates. Firmware Development: Develop firmware for all form factors. Implement Dante AV protocol support. Develop firmware for device configuration and control, including user interface for selecting resolution and frame rate. Implement firmware for monitoring device status and diagnostics. Optimize firmware for low-latency video processing and efficient resource utilization. Implement video encoding and decoding algorithms to support the specified resolutions and frame rates. Mechanical Design: Design and develop mechanical enclosures for standalone units and wall-plate units. Design and develop chassis card form factor. Ensure compliance with industry standards and regulations. 2. Testing and Validation: Functional Testing: Verify functionality of all features and interfaces. Test Dante AV integration and performance. Test PoE power delivery and operation. Test video and audio quality, including resolution, frame rate, and latency, at all supported configurations. Test user interface for selecting resolution and frame rate. Environmental Testing: Test for temperature, humidity, vibration, and shock. Test for electromagnetic compatibility (EMC) and radio frequency interference (RFI). Interoperability Testing: Test interoperability with other Dante AV devices. Test interoperability with third-party AV equipment. 3. Manufacturing and Production: Procurement of Components: Source and procure all necessary components. Establish reliable supply chains. Manufacturing Process: Develop manufacturing processes for all form factors. Implement quality control procedures. Production Testing: Test manufactured units to ensure quality and reliability. 4. Documentation and Support: User Manuals: Develop user manuals for all form factors. Provide clear instructions for installation, configuration, and operation, including instructions for selecting resolution and frame rate. Technical Documentation: Develop technical documentation, including schematics, firmware documentation, and test reports. Customer Support: Establish customer support channels. Provide technical support and troubleshooting assistance.
title: Electrical PCB Designer

description: Type: This is a 1099 contractor to Full-time Employee (W-2) position Experience: Minimum of 2 years of relevant experience. Location: 100% United States (U.S.) Based Remote with ALL being performed within the U.S.  U.S. Citizenship REQUIRED Role Summary: Join Via Logic, where innovation drives impact! We are seeking a talented Business Operations and Talent Analyst with 2-4 years of experience to support our internal small business operations. This a 1099 contract to full-time W2 position that plays a critical role in optimizing internal processes, talent acquisition, and project coordination to help Via Logic grow and succeed. You will be responsible for managing key business operations functions, ensuring effective coordination across teams, and driving talent recruitment and management initiatives. This is the perfect opportunity for a U.S. citizen with strong organizational and communication skills, who excels in managing business processes, coordinating resources, and building an engaged and high-performing team. Your Responsibilities: - Business Operations Management: Oversee and manage internal business operations, ensuring efficiency in workflows, team communication, and project timelines. Collaborate with leadership to implement process improvements and best practices. - Talent Recruitment & Management: Lead the recruitment process, from sourcing and screening candidates to managing onboarding. Develop and maintain strategies for talent development and retention to support Via Logic's growth. - Project Coordination: Coordinate internal projects, ensuring timely execution and effective team collaboration. Track resource utilization and project status, providing updates to leadership. - Opportunity Analyst: Evaluate new opportunities for Via Logic by conducting research, analyzing market trends, and preparing business proposals to support company initiatives. - Team Coordination & Event Management: Facilitate regular team meetings, support cross-team communication, and organize internal events, workshops, and training sessions to foster team engagement. - Resource & Asset Tracking: Maintain accurate tracking of internal resources, ensuring proper allocation and management of team assets such as technology, software, and equipment. Your Required Skills and Experience: - Education: Bachelor’s degree in a related field. - Experience: 2-4 years of experience in business operations, talent recruiting, or project coordination, with a proven ability to manage internal operations and resources. Skills: - Strong proficiency in business operations, talent acquisition, and team coordination. - Skilled in using project management tools like Monday.com tracking workflows and project progress. - Excellent communication and interpersonal skills for collaborating across departments and engaging team members. - Ability to prioritize tasks and manage multiple projects in a dynamic environment. - Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail. - Preferred: Experience in talent management and internal project coordination, familiarity with agile methodologies, and prior experience in a fast-paced business environment. Your Benefits: Remote Work: U.S.-based remote position offering flexibility for work-life balance. Health Care: Comprehensive health care benefits. Paid Time Off (PTO): Generous PTO to support work-life balance. How We Work: Must be available on company-provided communication tools such as Monday.com, Slack, email, and for meetings between 9 AM-5 PM EST. About Via Logic LLC and What We Do: The Via Logic team includes subject matter experts (SMEs) in IT investment analysis, domain analysis, and lean product delivery across key disciplines, such as enterprise and systems architecture, cybersecurity, cloud-native transitions, DevSecOps principles, operationalizing AI/ML, and robust identity management strategies. We focus on providing actionable enterprise architecture insights, supporting both Federal government and private sector modernization efforts.
title: Small Business Operations and Talent Analyst

Driver updates and peripheral software support. Basic IT troubleshooting, similar to a standard warranty service. description: Job Description: Menu2Scan.com is evolving! We are rebranding into a versatile platform poised to explore and capitalize on multiple verticals. To realize this vision, we’re seeking an experienced Senior Full-Stack Developer to upgrade our application, integrate essential features, and ensure scalability for diverse use cases. This is an exciting opportunity to contribute to a transformative project that blends innovation, usability, and robust technology. Key Responsibilities: • Platform Rebranding: Assist in the transformation of Menu2Scan.com into a scalable platform adaptable for various verticals. • Feature Development: Add functionality for generating diverse types of QR codes and upgrade the existing QR code library to accommodate new business requirements. • Payment Gateway Integration: Finalize and implement a seamless payment solution to support expanded functionalities. • Frontend Development: Build and enhance the user interface using Next.js and React, ensuring a seamless user experience for multiple verticals. • Backend Development: Develop scalable backend solutions with Node.js to support new features and future growth. • Cloud Portability: Optimize the platform to remain on GCP and Firebase while ensuring minimal effort is required to migrate to AWS, Azure, or other cloud providers. • Scalability: Architect and implement solutions to support a growing user base across multiple industries. Qualifications: • Experience: 5+ years in full-stack development with expertise in Next.js, React, and Node.js. • Frontend Skills: Proficiency in building user-friendly, responsive interfaces. • Backend Knowledge: Strong API development and server-side expertise with scalable solutions. • Cloud Experience: Hands-on experience with GCP and Firebase, with an understanding of cloud portability to AWS and Azure. • Adaptability: Ability to develop solutions that cater to different industries and use cases. Preferred Skills: • Experience working with QR code libraries and customizations. • Knowledge of payment gateway technologies. • Familiarity with CI/CD workflows and cloud DevOps. • Proven track record in scalable architecture design. Why Join Us? • Be part of a transformative project that is expanding into multiple verticals. • Work with cutting-edge technologies in a collaborative, innovative environment. • Flexible remote work opportunities with clear and meaningful goals. How to Apply: If you’re excited about contributing to a platform rebrand and developing solutions for multiple industries, we’d love to hear from you. Please include your resume, portfolio, and any relevant examples of your work in your application.
title: Senior Full-Stack Developer for Platform Upgrade and Rebranding

description: Job Description: We are looking for a skilled Software Developer with a background in Django and Python to help us to remove a bottleneck and bugs from one of the endpoints we have been having problems with lately. Server crashes after this endpoint gets reached and we think that the reason for it is a bad query, but we need more help to investigate it. Qualifications: Django Python HTML CSS PostgreSQL BitBucket GIT JavaScript
title: Django Developer

description: There are these physical chess e-boards called DGT (https://digitalgametechnology.com/products/home-use-e-boards). You connect by bluetooth to your computer, and they can send your moves to live chess games on e.g. lichess.org. I have an iOS companion app for this which I hired someone to work on a while ago, but the project ended up not being completed with some bugs remaining to fix. The way it works is: - you turn on your dgt physical chess board - you log into your laptop, connect it to the board, and start a game - you start the mobile app and can ignore the laptop, and the mobile app shows a game clock and alerts you to moves by your opponent DGT board —laptop—-lichess.org—-mobile app The idea is that this feels more like an in-person game with a chess clock than having to look at the computer. The app is written in swift. I’m a software engineer but am not a swift developer. The code is somewhat messy and has some bugs, eg sometimes the screen randomly turns black due to some race conditions This project: - I’ll send you the source code - you should do Q&A to find and list the bugs and then fix them - (maybe) help shepherd the app through the App Store release process The mobile app uses the lichess read-only API, so there is no need to communicate between the board and the website You don’t actually need the board in order to do this project. You can just start some games in lichess in your browser then connect to the same game from your iPhone or emulator
title: Debug and polish a lichess.org iOS companion app

description: We are looking for someone who loves using and teaching SAS. We want to see your teaching style. Are you upbeat? Boring? How do you engage the students? What's your vocal delivery like? Can you successfully teach the concept and ensure that it sinks in? We are a group of passionate instructors that help our clients understand not only the technical aspects of how to use various technologies, but also how to use it to solve important problems and drive business value. The ideal candidate will be hired for several training opportunities, allowing for a flexible schedule. The majority of our trainings are M-F, so availability during the week is a must. We offer both full and part-day trainings (2-3 hours). As a trainer, you will have opportunities throughout the year to provide trainings to the relevant clients. About 90% of our trainings are done virtually. Our trainers select the opportunities that fit their schedules and then they help our clients learn the software in 2–5 day training sessions. Occasionally, we do offer in-person trainings, for those who are interested. We need people who are passionate about technology and helping other people succeed. If this sounds like you, we’d love to have you as one of our instructors.
title: SAS Instructor for our Client

description: Hey! We run a little tech recruiting agency, focusing on finding and placing software engineers at early-stage startups. We're looking for someone to respond to candidate emails, take calls, and submit candidates that seem promising. This isn't a typical recruiting role as sourcing + reaching out to candidates is NOT part of this job! Just responding + taking calls + submitting. You'll need to be very personable and have great communication skills, as well as be reasonably technical. For the technical side, you'll be using email, phone, submitting resumes, and using our custom app. We're flexible on compensation, but we would like some kind of performance-based reward. We're thinking some base hourly rate + $1k for each person hired that you submit. Based on our current metrics, we estimate you'll land 2-4 hires a month if you work 40 hours a week. Let us know in your application what base you'd be comfortable with, given that. Looking forward to hearing from you!
title: Recruiting Coordinator

description: Description: We are urgently seeking a qualified consultant with expertise in FDA regulations to review and provide guidance on a set of internal quality and regulatory recommendations for our Class 1 510(k)-exempt medical device. This project requires a fast turnaround to help us ensure compliance while avoiding unnecessary actions that could delay production or increase costs. Scope of Work: The consultant will: 1. Review recommendations covering: -Documentation updates (design outputs, work instructions, DHF updates). -Hardware verification protocols (sterile and nonsterile testing). -Quality management obligations (QMS compliance, distribution processes). -Software compliance with FDA and IEC standards. -General operational and project management processes. 2. Provide feedback on which activities are necessary for FDA compliance and which may be excessive for a Class 1 510(k)-exempt device. 3. Deliver a concise, actionable report with prioritized recommendations and guidance. Ideal Candidate: -Expertise in FDA regulations for Class 1 medical devices and exemptions. -Familiarity with IEC 60601 and IEC 62304 standards for hardware and software compliance. -Strong background in ISO 13485 and quality systems. -Proven ability to assess regulatory recommendations critically and suggest cost- and time-efficient solutions. Additional Information: We require this review and guidance within a short timeframe. If successful, there is potential for ongoing collaboration.
title: FDA Regulatory and Quality Consultant for Class 1 Medical Device Review

description: We are looking for an experienced expert in Warehouse Management System (WMS) solutions to support our team in sourcing and implementing the ideal WMS software for a small business client. They will also provide training to the client’s staff and assist with any necessary customizations for the client’s specific workflows. The ideal candidate should have a successful track record of WMS implementation, especially working with clients at an international level. Strong project management and communication skills are essential, along with a patient and adaptable approach to handle challenges and ensure all project goals are met. If the project is successful, there is an opportunity for the expert to join our team for future projects and long-term collaboration. NDA will be required
